text.section: In this section, "transfer fee" means a charge payable on the transfer of an interest in real property or payable for the right to accept a transfer of an interest in real property.

section.section: A person who conveys a fee simple interest in real property may not record a covenant against the title to the real property for the payment of a transfer fee.
A covenant that requires the payment of a transfer fee on the conveyance of a fee simple interest in real property is void.
